   (function(w){'use strict';const requestedUrls=[];const keyData={};function fetch(key,url,callback){if(url[0]!=='/'){throw new Error('URL is malformed')}if(requestedUrls.indexOf(url)>-1){throw new Error('Provided url has already been requested');}if(key in keyData){throw new Error('Specified key already exists');}processUrl(key,url,callback)};function isKeyLoaded(key){if(key in keyData){return keyData[key].loaded}throw new Error('Either no key was provided, or no key-url pair exists');};function getData(key,callback){if(key in keyData){if(keyData[key].loaded===true){if(typeof callback==='function'){return callback(keyData[key].data)}else{return keyData[key].data}}else if(keyData[key].loaded===false&&typeof callback==='function'){keyData[key].callback=callback}else{throw new Error('Data is currently unavailable for key: '+key);}}else{throw new Error('Either no key was provided, or no key-url pair exists');}};function addCallback(key,callback){if(typeof callback==='function'&&key in keyData){if(isKeyLoaded(key)){return callback(getData(key))}keyData[key].callback=callback}else{if(typeof callback!=='function'){throw new Error('Expected a valid callback');}throw new Error('Key does not exist');}};function dumpLoadTable(){console.info(keyData,requestedUrls)};function processUrl(key,url,callback){keyData[key]={'loaded':false,'url':url,};requestedUrls.push(url);if(typeof callback==='function'){keyData[key].callback=callback}if(typeof window.fetch!=='undefined'){window.fetch(url).then(handleFetchResponse.bind(null,key))}else{const xmlRequest=new XMLHttpRequest();xmlRequest.open('GET',url);xmlRequest.addEventListener('load',handleXhrResponse.bind(null,key,xmlRequest));xmlRequest.send()}}function handleFetchResponse(key,response){if(response.ok){response.text().then(handleFetchText.bind(null,key))}else{throw new Error('Url failed to fetch - bad request');}}function handleFetchText(key,text){keyData[key].data=text;keyData[key].loaded=true;if('callback'in keyData[key]){keyData[key].callback(text);delete keyData[key].callback}}function handleXhrResponse(key,xmlRequest){if(xmlRequest.status>=400){throw new Error('Url failed to fetch - bad request');}handleFetchText.call(null,key,xmlRequest.response)}function hasKey(key){return key in keyData}if(!w.hasOwnProperty('immediateFetch')){w.immediateFetch={'fetch':fetch,'isKeyLoaded':isKeyLoaded,'getData':getData,'addCallback':addCallback,'dumpLoadTable':dumpLoadTable,'hasKey':hasKey,}}}(window));

                dataLayer.visitor[v] = 'Unknown';

/*# sourceMappingURL=css/compiled/personalized-deal-widget-desktop.css */
  </style>
  <noscript id="deferred-styles">
   <link crossorigin="anonymous" href="https://css.slickdealscdn.com/min/8537/g=css&amp;style=14&amp;n=global-desktop%2Cnon-criticalBase" media="screen" rel="stylesheet"/>
   <link crossorigin="anonymous" href="https://css.slickdealscdn.com/min/8537/g=css&amp;style=14&amp;n=fp-deferred%2Cfrontpage%2Ffrontpage-top-coupons-module-desktop-deferred" media="screen" rel="stylesheet"/>
  </noscript>
  <script>
   (function () {
            var loadDeferredStyles = function() {
              var addStylesNode = document.getElementById("deferred-styles");
              var replacement = document.createElement("div");
              var baseCssPath = '<link media="screen" href="https://css.slickdealscdn.com/min/8537/g=css&amp;style=14&amp;n=STYLE_PLACEHOLDER" rel="stylesheet" crossorigin="anonymous" >';
              var deferredStyles = addStylesNode.textContent.match(/n=([^"&]+)/g);

              if (deferredStyles && deferredStyles.length)
              {
                deferredStyles = deferredStyles.map(function(style) {
                  return style.substr(2);
                });

                replacement.innerHTML = baseCssPath.replace(/(STYLE_PLACEHOLDER)/g, deferredStyles.join('%2C'));
                document.head.appendChild(replacement);
                addStylesNode.parentElement.removeChild(addStylesNode);
              }
            };
            var raf = requestAnimationFrame || mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
                webkitRequestAnimationFrame || msRequestAnimationFrame;
            if (raf) raf(function() { window.setTimeout(loadDeferredStyles, 0); });
            else window.addEventListener('load', loadDeferredStyles);
          })();
  </script>

  <script>
   /** Global hydration queue */
    window.bpHydration = window.bpHydration || [];

    /**
     * Adds hydration data for JavaScript modules in Blueprint. Any module/data combinations
     * passed into this function are used when modules instantiate themselves through the
     * {@link componentLoader} function.
     * 
     * @param {String} moduleName The name of the element/component/pattern the data applies to
     * @param {Object} [moduleData={}] Any data to be passed into the JavaScript module up instantiation
     **/
    function bpHydrate(moduleName, moduleData) {
        moduleData = moduleData || {};

        if (typeof moduleName === 'string') {
            const obj = {};
            obj[moduleName] = moduleData;

            window.bpHydration.push(obj);
        }
    }
  </script>

    function gaPubadsReadyCallback(unit)
    {
      googletag.cmd.push(function ()
      {
        googletag.display(unit);
      });
      optimeraRefresh(unit);

    optimeraRefresh = function () {null;}
    optimeraRefreshAll = function () {null;}
    optimeraDelayedLoad = function () {null;}

  <script>
   function optimeraRefresh(divId)
  {
    // This function is defined in GTM
    if ('function' === typeof oPageUnload)
    {
      oPageUnload(divId);
    }
  }

  function optimeraRefreshAll()
  {
    // This function is defined in GTM
    if ('function' === typeof oPageUnload)
    {
      oPageUnload('ALL');
    }
  }

  function optimeraDelayedLoad()
  {
    // This function is defined in GTM
    if ('function' === typeof oPageUnload)
    {
      oPageUnload(1);
    }
  }
  </script>
  <script async="" src="//securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   (function ()
{
    var slotRef = {};

    if ('adSlot2' in window)
    {
        slotRef = window.adSlot2;
    }

    window.adSlot2 = slotRef;
    window.failSlots = {};

    function adStyleCallback(mutationsList)
    {
        for (let mutation in mutationsList)
        {
            if (mutation.type === 'attributes' && mutation.attributeName === 'style' && mutation.target.style.cssText !== '')
            {
                mutation.target.style.cssText = '';
            }
        }
    }

    let preDefinedSlots = [];

    function doSlotProcessingAfterLoad()
    {
        preDefinedSlots.forEach(function (data) {
            if (document.getElementById(data.id))
            {
                const config = {
                    'attributes': true,
                    'childList': false,
                    'subtree': false
                };
                const observer = new MutationObserver(adStyleCallback);

                observer.observe(document.getElementById(data.id), config);
            }

            const element = document.querySelector(['#' + data.id, '.' + data.id].join(','));
            if (element === null)
            {
                googletag.destroySlots([data.slot]);

                if (window.heap && window.heap.track)
                {
                    console.log("Bad Ad Defined: " + data.id + ' - ' + data.path);
                    window.heap.track("Bad Ad Defined", {
                        'divId': data.id,
                        'adUnit': data.path
                    });
                }
            }
        });
    }

    function verifyOrNotify(data)
    {
        if (typeof data !== 'object')
        {
            console.log("Expected data, got the below", data);
            return;
        }

        var unitBoundary,
            boundaryFn,
            boundaryWidths = [],
            sizeMap = false;

      if ('sizeMapping' in data && data.sizeMapping.length > 0)
        {
            sizeMap = googletag.sizeMapping();

            for (let key = data.sizeMapping.length - 1; key > -1; key--)
            {
                sizeMap = sizeMap.addSize(data.sizeMapping[key]['viewport'], data.sizeMapping[key]['unitSize']);

                if (data.sizeMapping[key]['viewport'][0] > 0)
                {
                    boundaryWidths.push(data.sizeMapping[key]['viewport'][0]);
                }
            }

            sizeMap = sizeMap.build();
            console.info('%c%s -> %s', 'color: white; background-color: black;', data.id, JSON.stringify(sizeMap));
        }
        let tag = googletag.defineSlot(data.path, data.sizes, data.id);

        if (tag !== null)
        {
            if (sizeMap)
            {
                tag.defineSizeMapping(sizeMap);

                if (boundaryWidths.length > 0)
                {
                    boundaryFn = function ()
                    {
                        console.info('%cBoundary Refresh for slot: %o', 'color: orange; background-color: black;', this.adSlot);
                        googletag.pubads().clear([this.adSlot]);
                        googletag.pubads().refresh([this.adSlot]);
                        optimeraRefresh(this.adSlot.getSlotElementId());
                    };

                    for (let key = boundaryWidths.length - 1; key > -1; key--)
                    {
                        if (typeof window.sdRequire !== 'undefined')
                        {
                            sdRequire.push([['boundary'], function (viewportWidth, callback, adSlot)
                            {
                                var adBoundary = new Boundary();
                                adBoundary.addBoundary(viewportWidth, callback.bind({'adSlot': adSlot}));
                            }.bind(
                                null,
                                boundaryWidths[key],
                                boundaryFn,
                                tag
                            ), ['controllerLoad']]);
                        }
                        else if (typeof window.Boundary !== 'undefined')
                        {
                            unitBoundary = new Boundary();
                            unitBoundary.addBoundary(boundaryWidths[key], boundaryFn.bind({'adSlot': tag}));
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            tag.addService(googletag.pubads());

            if ('targeting' in data)
            {
                len = data.targeting.length - 1;

                for (; len > -1; len--)
                {
                    tag.setTargeting(data.targeting[len][0], data.targeting[len][1]);
                }
            }

            if (data.lazyLoad && !window.usingAdLazyLoad)
            {
                googletag.cmd.push(function()
                {
                    googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad({
                        fetchMarginPercent: 0,
                        renderMarginPercent: 0,
                        mobileScaling: 2.0
                    });
                });

                window.usingAdLazyLoad = true;
            }

            slotRef[data.id] = tag;
        }
        else
        {
            failSlots[data.id] = {'msg': 'defineSlot call failed for [' + data.id + ']', 'data': data};
        }

        let slotData = {
            id: data.id,
            path: data.path,
            slot: tag
        };
        preDefinedSlots.push(slotData);
    }

    // Expose to naked window:
    window.verifyOrNotify = verifyOrNotify;

    function displayAds()
    {
        defineSlots();
        fetchBids();
        window.sdLoadQueue.push([fetchAndRenderAds, 'revenueGenerating']);
    }

    function defineSlots()
    {
        googletag.cmd.push(function googleCmdDefineSlots() {
            var generalTargeting = {"targeting":[["article_label","N\/A"],["requestSource","GPT"],["ptype","hp"],["login","no"],["view","redesign"],["env","prod"],["UserGroup","C"],["pvnum","1"],["exp","8"],["utm_source","*blank*"],["utm_medium","*blank*"],["utm_campaign","*blank*"],["utm_term","*blank*"],["utm_content","*blank*"],["scat","none"]]}, pRef = googletag.pubads(), key;
            if ('targeting' in generalTargeting)
            {
                for (key in generalTargeting.targeting)
                {
                    if (typeof generalTargeting.targeting[key] === 'object')
                    {
                        pRef.setTargeting.apply(pRef, generalTargeting.targeting[key]);
                    }
                }
            }

                    var adSlot = {};

if ('adSlot2' in window)
{
    adSlot = window.adSlot2;
}

window.adSlot2 = adSlot;

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp300ATF1A","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]],"id":"top-300x250-300x600-A","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","atf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp300ATF2A","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]],"id":"top-300x250-300x600-B","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","atf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp728BTF","sizes":[[728,90],[468,60]],"id":"middle-728x90","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false,"sizeMapping":[{"viewport":[0,0],"unitSize":[468,60]},{"viewport":[1115,200],"unitSize":[[728,90],[468,60]]}]});

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp300BTF1","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]],"id":"rightcol-300x250-300x600-B","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp300BTF2","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]],"id":"rightcol-300x250-300x600-C","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp300BTF3","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]],"id":"rightcol-300x250-300x600-D","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp160BTF","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600],[160,600]],"id":"rightcol-300x250-300x600-160x600","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false});

  
  verifyOrNotify({"path":"\/1006041\/hp728BTF1","sizes":[[468,60],[728,90]],"id":"middle-728x90-970x250","targeting":[["bucket",8],["pos","btf"],["refresh",1]],"lazyLoad":false,"sizeMapping":[{"viewport":[0,0],"unitSize":[468,60]},{"viewport":[1115,200],"unitSize":[[728,90],[468,60]]},{"viewport":[1400,360],"unitSize":[[728,90],[468,60]]}]});
    
      
      
  
          





          
            if (!window.usingAdLazyLoad)
            {
                googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
                googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
            }
        });
    }

    var doRefresh = true;
    function fetchBids()
    {
        googletag.cmd.push(function () {
          
          
          // Initially set as false in dfp_ad_integration.js.twig
doRefresh = false;

!function(a9,a,p,s,t,A,g){if(a[a9])return;function q(c,r){a[a9]._Q.push([c,r])}a[a9]={init:function(){q("i",arguments)},fetchBids:function()
{q("f",arguments)},_Q:[]};A=p.createElement(s);A.async=!0;A.src=t;g=p.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];g.parentNode.insertBefore(A,g)} ("apstag",window,document,"script","//c.amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js");

apstag.init({
    pubID: '3097',
    adServer: 'googletag',
    bidTimeout: 2e3
});

var amznAdSlots = [];

if (typeof slotRef !== 'undefined')
{
    for (var id in slotRef)
    {
        var sizes = [];
        var unProcessSizes = slotRef[id].getSizes() || [];
        var len = unProcessSizes.length;

        for (var j = 0; j < len; j++)
        {
            if (unProcessSizes[j].getWidth)
            {
                sizes.push([
                    unProcessSizes[j].getWidth(), unProcessSizes[j].getHeight()
                ]);
            }
        }

        amznAdSlots.push({
            'slotID': id,
            'slotName': slotRef[id].getAdUnitPath(),
            'sizes': sizes
        });
    }
}

if (amznAdSlots.length)
{
    apstag.fetchBids(
    {
        slots: amznAdSlots
    },
    function(bids)
    {
        var refreshAds = function()
        {
            googletag.cmd.push(function ()
            {
                apstag.setDisplayBids();

                                    function tryPrebidRefresh(counter)
                    {
                        var emitDone = false;

                        if (counter > 0)
                        {
                            if (typeof pbjs !== 'undefined' && 'refreshAds' in pbjs)
                            {
                                pbjs.refreshAds(Object.keys(window.adSlot2).map(function (key)
                                {
                                    return window.adSlot2[key].getAdUnitPath();
                                }));
                                emitDone = true;
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                setTimeout(tryPrebidRefresh.bind(null, counter - 1), 50);
                            }
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            googletag.pubads().refresh();
                            optimeraRefreshAll();
                            emitDone = true;
                        }

                        if (emitDone && typeof window.dispatchEvent === 'function')
                        {
                            window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('onAdsReady'))
                        }
                    }

                    setTimeout(tryPrebidRefresh.bind(null, 100), 50);            });
        };
                    refreshAds();
            });
}


          
            googletag.enableServices();
        });

    }

    function fetchAndRenderAds()
    {
        googletag.cmd.push(function()
        {
            doSlotProcessingAfterLoad();



                      if (doRefresh)
            {
                // Need to wait for pubads service to be ready before calling refresh - or stall.
                (function (factory)
                {
                    'use strict';

                    if (typeof window.sdRequire !== 'undefined')
                    {
                        sdRequire.push([['sd/core/proxyAwait'], factory]);
                    }
                    else if (window.ProxyAwait)
                    {
                        factory(window.ProxyAwait);
                    }
                } (function (ProxyAwait)
                {
                    new ProxyAwait('googletag').chain(
                        new ProxyAwait('pubadsReady', null, {
                            'successCallback': function ()
                            {
                                var slotObjectArray = [], i;

                                for (i in slotRef)
                                {
                                    slotObjectArray.push(slotRef[i]);
                                }

                                if (slotObjectArray.length > 0)
                                {
                                    googletag.pubads().refresh(slotObjectArray);
                                    slotObjectArray.forEach(function (slot)
                                    {
                                        optimeraRefresh(slot.getSlotElementId());
                                    });
                                }

                                if (typeof window.dispatchEvent === 'function')
                                {
                                    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('onAdsReady'))
                                }
                            }
                        })
                    ).process();
                }));
            }
        });
    }

      displayAds();
  })();
  </script>

        {

              },
              {

                'ignoreTabBlur': false
              },
            ]
          });
        }]);
  </script>

  <script async="true" src="//slickdeals.btttag.com/btt.js" type="text/javascript">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.heap = window.heap || [], heap.load = function(e, t)
		{
			window.heap.appid = e, window.heap.config = t = t || {};

	        window.sdLoadQueue.push([function ()
	        {
				var r = t.forceSSL || "https:" === document.location.protocol,
					a = document.createElement("script");
				a.type = "text/javascript", a.async = !0, a.src = (r ? "https:" : "http:") + "//cdn.heapanalytics.com/js/heap-" + e + ".js";
				var n = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
				n.parentNode.insertBefore(a, n);
			}, 'analytics']);

			for (var o = function(e) {
					return function() {
						heap.push([e].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 0)))
					}
				}, p = ["addEventProperties", "addUserProperties", "clearEventProperties", "identify", "resetIdentity", "removeEventProperty", "setEventProperties", "track", "unsetEventProperty"], c = 0; c < p.length; c++) heap[p[c]] = o(p[c])
		};

		heap.load("4023737901", {
			secureCookie: true,
			forceSSL: true
		});

		function findClosestElement(target, selector) {
			if (!target)
			{
				return undefined;
			}

			while (target && !target.matches(selector) && !target.matches('body'))
			{
				target = target.parentElement;
			}

			return (target && target.matches(selector)) ? target : undefined;
		}

		// Once all window dependencies are loaded, fire module impressions and listen for module clicks
		window.onload = function (event) {
			const modules = Array.prototype.slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('[data-module-name]'));
			const moduleNames = modules.map(function (element) {
				return element.getAttribute('data-module-name');
			});

			for (let i = 0; i < moduleNames.length; ++i) {
				window.heap.track('Module Impression', {'moduleName': moduleNames[i]});
			}

			document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
				let clickElm = e.target;
				const parentElm = findClosestElement(clickElm, '[data-module-name]');

				if (!clickElm.hasAttribute('data-module-item'))
				{
					while (clickElm && clickElm.tagName !== 'BODY' && typeof clickElm.hasAttribute === 'function' && !clickElm.hasAttribute('data-module-item'))
					{
						clickElm = clickElm.parentNode;
					}
				}

				if (parentElm && clickElm && clickElm.tagName !== 'BODY')
				{
					let children = Array.prototype.filter.call(parentElm.querySelectorAll('[data-module-item]'), function (elm) {
						return elm.offsetParent !== null;
					});

					window.heap.track('Module Click', {'moduleName': parentElm.dataset.moduleName, 'moduleItemPosition': children.indexOf(clickElm)+1})
				}
			}, false);
		}
  </script>
  <script async="async" defer="defer"      <script>
      sdRequire.push([['jquery', 'sd/featured/frequencyCapController', ], function ($, FrequencyCapController) {
            $.ajax({
              url: '/ajax/featuredDeals.php',
              data: {
                'hasPrefs': 0,
                'isReturningUser': 0,
                'alwaysShowFireDeals': true,
                'displayPercentOff': 1,
                'fpListType': 'grid'
              },
              success: function(data) {
                $('#featDealsAndCoupons').replaceWith(data.html);

                const $module = $('[data-module-name="Featured Deals"]');
                const frequencyCapController = new FrequencyCapController({});

                frequencyCapController.updateCappedDealsCookie($module);

                window.sdLoadQueue.push([function ()
                {
                    sdRequire.push([['sd/paidPlacements/merchantPixelTrackingController'], function (MerchantPixelTrackingController)
                    {
                        const merchantTrackingController = new MerchantPixelTrackingController();

                        merchantTrackingController.handleAjaxModule($module);
                    }]);
                }, 'thirdPartyPixels']);

                              },
              dataType: 'json'
            });
          }]);
     </script>
     <div class="gridCategory personalizedWidget invisible" data-module-name="Personalized Deals" id="personalizedWidget">

       </span>
      </div>

       <div class="carouselWrapper" data-role="carouselWrapper">
        <ul class="carouselItems blueprint dealTileGridOverrides" data-role="carouselItems">
        </ul>
       </div>

     <div class="gridCategory removeHidden" data-blockname="best" data-module-name="Frontpage Slickdeals" data-timestamp="0">
      <div class="gridHeading">
       <h2>
        <div class="headingRight" data-role="openFpPreferences">
         <div class="button fpSettingsButton act-fp-preferences" id="fpSettingsButton">

     <div class="gridCategory fpNewsAndArticles" data-module-name="News &amp; Articles" data-news-module="" id="fpNewsAndArticles">
      <div class="gridHeading">
       <h2>
        News &amp; Articles
       </h2>
      </div>

       <script>
        window.sdLoadQueue.push([function (a)
                    {
                      (function (factory)
                      {
                        if (typeof window.sdRequire !== 'undefined')
                        {
                          sdRequire.push([['sd/core/proxyAwait'], factory]);
                        }
                        else if (window.ProxyAwait)
                        {
                          factory(ProxyAwait);
                        }
                      }(function (ProxyAwait)
                      {
                        
                        if (typeof criteo_pubtag === 'undefined' || (criteo_pubtag.hasOwnProperty('context') && criteo_pubtag.context.isAdBlocked === false))
                        {
                          gaPubadsReadyCallback('top-300x250-300x600-A');
                        }
                      }));
                        }, 'revenueGenerating']);

     <div class="sideGridBox abc" id="crt-adblock-b">
      <div class="ablock" data-adlocation="right-column-1" id="top-300x250-300x600-B">
       <script>
        window.sdLoadQueue.push([function (a)
                    {
                      (function (factory)
                      {
                        if (typeof window.sdRequire !== 'undefined')
                        {
                          sdRequire.push([['sd/core/proxyAwait'], factory]);
                        }
                        else if (window.ProxyAwait)
                        {
                          factory(ProxyAwait);
                        }
                      }(function (ProxyAwait)
                      {
                        
                        if (typeof criteo_pubtag === 'undefined' || (criteo_pubtag.hasOwnProperty('context') && criteo_pubtag.context.isAdBlocked === false))
                        {
                          gaPubadsReadyCallback('top-300x250-300x600-B');
                        }
                      }));
                    }, 'revenueGenerating']);
       </script>
       <span class="bt-uid-tg" data-uid="5c4a012c34-226" style="display: none !important">
       </span>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div data-module-name="Featured Coupons &amp; Discounts" id="featuredCouponsAndDiscountsPlaceholder">
     </div>
     <div class="sideGridBox ad">
      <div class="adunit" data-adlocation="right-column-2" id="rightcol-300x250-300x600-B">
       <script type="text/javascript">
        window.sdLoadQueue.push([function ()
            {
              gaPubadsReadyCallback('rightcol-300x250-300x600-B');
            }, 'revenueGenerating']);
       </script>
       <span class="bt-uid-tg" data-uid="5c4a012c34-226" style="display: none !important">
       </span>
      </div>

  <script>
   (function(sdwndw)
  {
    sdwndw.SD = sdwndw.SD || {};
    SD.CookieService = SD.CookieService || {callQueue: []};

    sdwndw.showAutoReg = function(title, copy, ctaText, delay, showAlways)
    {
      showAlways = showAlways || false;

            if (title && copy && ctaText && !isNaN(delay) && delay > 0)
      {
        if (!showAlways)
        {
                  }

        setTimeout(function()
        {
          if ($('.simplemodal-overlay').is(':visible') ||
              $('.sdModalOverlay').is(':visible') ||
              $('#couponModalOverlay').is(':visible') ||
              $('[data-role="subscribeinline"],[data-role="subscribeside"]').is(':visible')
          )
          {
            return false;
          }

          try
          {
            const $extensionModalTemplate = $('[data-js-template="extensionAutoRegistrationModal"]');

            if ($extensionModalTemplate.length)
            {
                require(['sd/extension/extensionAutoRegistrationModal'], function(ExtensionAutoRegistrationModal)
                {
                    new ExtensionAutoRegistrationModal($extensionModalTemplate).show();
                });
            }
            else if ($('[data-js-template="autoRegistrationModal"]').length)
            {
                require(['sd/registration/autoRegistrationController'], function(AutoRegistrationController)
                {
                    new AutoRegistrationController({
                        title: decodeURI(title),
                        copy: decodeURI(copy),
                        ctaText: decodeURI(ctaText),
                        requireCaptcha: false,
                        googleRegistrationVersion: "",
                    });
                });
            }
          } catch (e)
          {
            //console.error(e);
          }
          SD.CookieService.callQueue.push(function()
          {
              SD.CookieService.persistent.setCookie('magicModal', Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000));
          });
        }, decodeURI(delay) * 1000);

      }
          }
  })(window);
  </script>
